targets.rawSql:
with now as (
  WITH A AS (
    SELECT
      CASE
        WHEN DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE()
        AND $diff < 10
        AND $diff > 2 THEN 0
        ELSE m_visits
      END as m_visits,
      DATETIME(tmstp) as time,
      date
    FROM
      `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}`
    WHERE
      $webFilter
      AND tmstp BETWEEN DATETIME_SUB(CURRENT_DATETIME(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY)
      AND CURRENT_DATETIME()
      AND CASE
        WHEN DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE()
        AND $diff > 2
        AND $diff < 10 THEN DATE(tmstp) < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
        ELSE TRUE
      END
  ),
  B AS (
    SELECT
      CASE
        WHEN DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE()
        AND $diff > 2
        AND $diff < 10 THEN MAX(m_visits)
        ELSE 0
      END as m_visits,
      date as time,
      date
    FROM
      `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits_today_append`
    WHERE
      $webFilter
      AND CASE
        WHEN DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE() THEN date <= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
        ELSE TRUE
      END
    GROUP BY
      date
  )
  SELECT
    *
  FROM
    A
  UNION
  ALL
  SELECt
    *
  FROM
    B
),
data as (
  SELECT
    sum(m_visits) as m_visits,
    $granularity as time,
    '$ZeitraumText' as Zeitraum
  FROM
    now --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  WHERE
    $feverZeitraum
    AND $Datum
  GROUP BY
    time
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE()
    AND $diff > 2 AND $diff > 10 THEN DATE_SUB(time, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
    ELSE time
  END AS time,
  Zeitraum,
  CASE
    WHEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE() THEN IF(
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      ) < 0,
      0,
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      )
    )
    WHEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN IF(
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      ) < 0,
      0,
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      )
    )
    ELSE IF(m_visits < 0, 0, m_visits)
  END as m_visits
FROM
  data
ORDER BY
  time ASC

targets.rawSql:
with past as (
  SELECT
    m_visits,
    DATETIME(tmstp) as time,
    date
  FROM
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}`
  WHERE
    ($webFilter) --AND tmstp BETWEEN DATETIME_SUB(CURRENT_DATETIME(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY) AND CURRENT_DATETIME()
),
data as (
  SELECT
    sum(m_visits) as m_visits,
    $granularity as time,
    '$OldZeitraumText' as Zeitraum
  FROM
    past
  WHERE
    CASE
      WHEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
      OR DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE() THEN $oldDatum
      AND $oldfeverZeitraum
      ELSE $staggeredfeverZeitraum
    END
    AND CASE
      WHEN DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE()
      AND $diff > 10 THEN date < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL $diff + 1 DAY)
      ELSe TRUE
    END
  GROUP BY
    time
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE()
    AND $diff > 2
    AND $diff < 10 THEN DATETIME_ADD(time, INTERVAL $diff -1 DAY)
    ELSE DATETIME_ADD(time, INTERVAL $diff DAY)
  END as time,
  Zeitraum,
  CASE
    WHEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE() THEN IF(
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      ) < 0,
      0,
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      )
    )
    WHEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) THEN IF(
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      ) < 0,
      0,
      (
        m_visits - LAG(m_visits) OVER (
          PARTITION BY Zeitraum
          ORDER BY
            time ASC
        )
      )
    )
    ELSE IF(m_visits < 0, 0, m_visits)
  END as m_visits
FROM
  data
ORDER BY
  time ASC

with data as (
  SELECT
    sum(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks,
    datetime(tmstp) as time
  FROM
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}`
  WHERE
    ($avwebFilter)
    AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY)
    AND CURRENT_DATE()
  GROUP BY
    time
)
SELECT
  m_av_playbacks,
  date(time) as time,
  '$ZeitraumText' as Zeitraum,
  $diff as diff
FROM
  data
WHERE
  $feverZeitraum
  AND CASE
    WHEN DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE()
    AND $diff < 10
    AND $diff > 2 THEN time < CURRENT_DATE()
    ELSE TRUE
  END
ORDER BY
  time

with data as 
(SELECT sum(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks, datetime(tmstp) as time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily` 
WHERE 
  ($avwebFilter)
  AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE()
  GROUP BY time 
)
SELECT 
  m_av_playbacks, 
  DATE(DATE_ADD(time, INTERVAL $diff DAY )) as time, 
  '$OldZeitraumText' as Zeitraum, $diff as diff
FROM data 
WHERE $oldavfeverZeitraum
ORDER BY time

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}` 
WHERE ${av_condition}
AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE()
)

AND CASE
    WHEN DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin") = CURRENT_DATE()
    AND $diff < 10
    AND $diff > 2 THEN time < CURRENT_DATE()
    ELSE TRUE
  END
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

targets.rawSql:
--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

with w as (
  SELECT  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
    WHERE $webFilter AND $newZeitraum),
a as (
  SELECT  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}` 
  WHERE $appFilter AND $newZeitraum
  GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY m_visits DESC
  LIMIT 1)


SELECT  w.m_visits + a.m_visits as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

with w as (
  SELECT  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM (
      SELECT DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL ${diff} DAY) as date, m_visits
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
      WHERE $webFilter 
    )
    WHERE $newZeitraum
),
a as (
  SELECT  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}` 
  WHERE $appFilter AND $newZeitraum
  GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY m_visits DESC
  LIMIT 1
    )
SELECT  w.m_visits + a.m_visits as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

with w as (
  SELECT m_visits, date, m_page_loads, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE 
    ($webFilter
    AND $newZeitraum 
    ) 
),
a as (
  SELECT m_visits, date, m_page_loads, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE $appFilter
  AND $newZeitraum 
)
SELECT REPLACE( CAST(ROUND(SUM(w.m_page_loads+a.m_page_loads)/SUM(w.m_visits + a.m_visits),2) as string), '.', ',') as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

with w as (
  SELECT SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, sum(m_page_loads) as m_page_loads, 1 as id
  FROM (
      SELECT m_visits, datetime_add(datetime(date), INTERVAL ${diff} DAY) as date, m_page_loads 
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
      WHERE 
        $webFilter
      ) 
  --WHERE $Zeitraum
  WHERE $newZeitraum  
  ),
a as (
  SELECT SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id,sum(m_page_loads) as m_page_loads
  FROM(
    SELECT datetime_add(datetime(date), INTERVAL ${diff} DAY) as date, m_visits, m_page_loads
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
    WHERE $appFilter)
  WHERE $newZeitraum  
  )

SELECT REPLACE( CAST(ROUND(SUM(w.m_page_loads+a.m_page_loads)/SUM(w.m_visits + a.m_visits),2) as string), '.', ',') as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

with w as (
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum
  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE $webFilter 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  WHERE $newZeitraum
),
a as(
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE 
    ($appFilter
    --AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE()
    ) 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
   WHERE $newZeitraum
)
SELECT  CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((a.time_spent + w.time_spent)/(a.visits + w.visits),1) as STRING), '.', ','), ' Sek.') as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

with w as (
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum
  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL $diff DAY) as date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE $webFilter 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  WHERE $newZeitraum
),
a as(
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, DATE_ADD(datetime(date), INTERVAL $diff DAY) as date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE 
    ($appFilter
    --AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND CURRENT_DATE()
    ) 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
   WHERE $newZeitraum
)
SELECT  CONCAT(REPLACE(CAST(ROUND((a.time_spent + w.time_spent)/(a.visits + w.visits),1) as STRING), '.', ','), ' Sek.') as Zeitraum
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id

with data_web as 
(SELECT sum(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks, datetime(date) as time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}` 
WHERE 
  $avwebFilter
  AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE()
  GROUP BY time 
),
web as (
  SELECT 
  sum(m_av_playbacks) as Zeitraum, 1 as id
  FROM data_web
  WHERE $Zeitraum),
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")),
data_app as (SELECT m_av_playbacks, date as time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}` 
WHERE ${av_condition}
AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE()
),
app as (SELECT SUM(m_av_playbacks) as Zeitraum, 1 as id
FROM data_app 
WHERE $Zeitraum)
--WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin"))
SELECT SUM(web.Zeitraum) + SUM(app.Zeitraum) as Zeitraum
FROM web
JOIN app
ON web.id = app.id

with data_web as 
(SELECT sum(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks, DATE_ADD(datetime(date), INTERVAL $diff DAY) as time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily` 
WHERE 
  ($avwebFilter)
  AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE()
  GROUP BY time 
),
web as (
  SELECT 
  sum(m_av_playbacks) as Zeitraum, 1 as id
  FROM data_web
  WHERE $Zeitraum
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
  ),
data_app as (SELECT m_av_playbacks, DATE_ADD(datetime(date), INTERVAL $diff DAY) as time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av_joined_daily` 
WHERE ${av_condition}
AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE()
),
app as (SELECT SUM(m_av_playbacks) as Zeitraum, 1 as id
FROM data_app 
--WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
WHERE $Zeitraum
)
SELECT SUM(web.Zeitraum) + SUM(app.Zeitraum) as Zeitraum
FROM web
JOIN app
ON web.id = app.id

--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

with w as (
  SELECT  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
    WHERE $webFilter AND $newZeitraum),
a as (
  SELECT  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits${table_fever_curve}` 
  WHERE $appFilter AND $newZeitraum
  GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY m_visits DESC
  LIMIT 1),

new_data as (SELECT  w.m_visits + a.m_visits as Zeitraum, 2 as id
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id),
--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum
w_old as (
    SELECT  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM (
      SELECT DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL ${diff} DAY) as date, m_visits
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
      WHERE $webFilter 
    )
    WHERE $newZeitraum),
a_old as (
  SELECT  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id
    FROM (
      SELECT DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL ${diff} DAY) as date, m_visits, site_level2, tmstp
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
      WHERE $appFilter
    )
    WHERE $newZeitraum 
    GROUP BY site_level2, tmstp
  ORDER BY m_visits DESC
  LIMIT 1),
old_data as (SELECT  w_old.m_visits + a_old.m_visits as Zeitraum, 2 as id
FROM w_old
JOIN a_old ON w_old.id = a_old.id)
SELECT CONCAT(IF(ROUND(((new_data.Zeitraum / old_data.Zeitraum )-1)*100,1)>0, '+', ''),REPLACE(CAST(ROUND(((new_data.Zeitraum / old_data.Zeitraum )-1)*100,1) as STRING), '.', ','),' %') as Differenz
FROM new_data
JOIN old_data
ON new_data.id = old_data.id

--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

with w as (
  SELECT m_visits, date, m_page_loads, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE 
    ($webFilter
    AND $newZeitraum 
    ) 
),
a as (
  SELECT m_visits, date, m_page_loads, 1 as id
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE $appFilter
  AND $newZeitraum 
),
new_data as (SELECT SUM(w.m_page_loads+a.m_page_loads)/SUM(w.m_visits + a.m_visits) as Zeitraum, 2 as id
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id),
--Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum
w_old as (
  SELECT SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, sum(m_page_loads) as m_page_loads, 1 as id
  FROM (
      SELECT m_visits, datetime_add(datetime(date), INTERVAL ${diff} DAY) as date, m_page_loads 
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
      WHERE 
        $webFilter
      ) 
  --WHERE $Zeitraum
  WHERE $newZeitraum  
  ),
a_old as (
  SELECT SUM(m_visits) as m_visits, 1 as id,sum(m_page_loads) as m_page_loads
  FROM(
    SELECT datetime_add(datetime(date), INTERVAL ${diff} DAY) as date, m_visits, m_page_loads
    FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
    WHERE $appFilter)
  WHERE $newZeitraum  
  ),
old_data as (SELECT  ROUND((w_old.m_page_loads+a_old.m_page_loads)/(w_old.m_visits + a_old.m_visits),6) as Zeitraum, 2 as id
FROM w_old
JOIN a_old ON w_old.id = a_old.id)
SELECT CONCAT(IF(ROUND(((new_data.Zeitraum / old_data.Zeitraum )-1)*100,2)>0, '+', ''),REPLACE(CAST(ROUND(((new_data.Zeitraum / old_data.Zeitraum )-1)*100,2) as STRING), '.', ','),' %') as Differenz
FROM new_data
JOIN old_data
ON new_data.id = old_data.id

with w as (
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum
  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL $diff DAY) as date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits`

    ($appFilter    ) 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
   WHERE $newZeitraum
),
data_old as (SELECT  ((w.time_spent + a.time_spent)/(w.visits + a.visits)) as Zeitraum, 2 as id
FROM w 
JOIN a ON w.id = a.id),
w_new as (
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum
  with now as (SELECT m_time_spent_per_visits, m_visits, date--time(tmstp) as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits` 
  WHERE $webFilter 
  )
  SELECT  SUM(m_time_spent_per_visits/1000 * m_visits) as time_spent, SUM(m_visits)as visits, 2 as id
  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")

),
a_new as(
    --Select 'N/A' as Zeitraum

  )

  FROM now 
  --WHERE time BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}', "Europe/Berlin") AND DATE('${__to:date}', "Europe/Berlin")
   WHERE $newZeitraum
),
data_new as (

  FROM w_new 
  JOIN a_new ON w_new.id = a_new.id)

SELECT CONCAT(IF(ROUND(((data_new.Zeitraum/data_old.Zeitraum)-1)*100,2)>0, '+',''),REPLACE(CAST(ROUND(((data_new.Zeitraum/data_old.Zeitraum)-1)*100,2) as STRING), '.', ','), '%') as Differenz

)

with web as (
  SELECT   
    publishing_date,  
    m_visits, 
    content_id_sophora, 
    m_page_loads, 
    content_titel, 
    url,
    uuid--,DATETIME(tmstp) as date
  from `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles${articleTable}` 
  WHERE 
    $listwebFilter 
    --AND "$page_chapter1" IN UNNEST(page_chapter1_tags) 
    --AND "$page_chapter2" IN UNNEST(page_chapter2_tags)
    AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
    AND $newZeitraum 
    AND objekt_typ NOT LIKE 'indexPage'

),
app as (
  SELECT 
    IFNULL(SUM(m_visits),0) as m_visits, 
    ANY_VALUE(publishing_date) as publishing_date,
    ANY_VALUE(content_id_sophora) as content_id_sophora, 
    ANY_VALUE(content_titel) as content_titel,
    ANY_VALUE(url) as url,
    IFNULL(SUM(m_page_loads),0) as m_page_loads, 
    ANY_VALUE(page_chapter1) as Kapitel,
    uuid
  from `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles${articleTable}` 
  WHERE CONTAINS_SUBSTR(site_level2, '$app_name')
  AND $newZeitraum
  AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
  AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
  GROUP BY uuid
  ),
sum_raw as (
  SELECT 
  IFNULL(web.publishing_date, app.publishing_date) as publishing_date,
  IFNULL(web.content_titel, app.content_titel) as content_titel, 
  IFNULL(web.content_id_sophora,app.content_id_sophora) as content_id_sophora, 
  IFNULL(web.url, app.url) as url,
  web.uuid as uuid,
  IFNULL(web.m_visits,0) as visits_web, 
  IFNULL(app.m_visits,0) as visits_app, 
  IFNULL(web.m_page_loads,0) as page_web, 
  IFNULL(app.m_page_loads,0) as page_app, 
  Kapitel
  FROM web
  FULL JOIN app 
  ON web.uuid = app.uuid
)
SELECT 
  IF(LENGTH(MAX(publishing_date)) > 4,FORMAT_DATETIME('%d.%m.%Y | %R Uhr', DATETIME(MAX(publishing_date))),MAX(publishing_date)) as Datum, 
  content_titel as Artikel, 
  content_id_sophora as Sophora, 
  ANY_VALUE(url HAVING MAX LENGTH(url)) as url, 
  SUM(visits_web) + SUM(visits_app) as Visits, 
  SUM(visits_web) as visits_web, 
  SUM(visits_app) as visits_app, 
  SUM(page_web) + SUM(page_app) as page_views, 
  SUM(page_web) as page_web, 
  SUM(page_app) as page_app, 
  ANY_VALUE(Kapitel) as Kapitel
FROM sum_raw
GROUP BY content_titel,  content_id_sophora, uuid--, publishing_date,
ORDER BY Visits DESC
LIMIT 100

(

web as (

app as (

)

JOIN app
ON web.id = app.id

with web_raw as (
  SELECT
    MAX(bi_av_publication_date) as bi_av_publication_date,
    SUM(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks,
    MAX(av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    bi_av_content_id,
    ANY_VALUE(bi_av_content HAVING MAX bi_av_publication_date) as bi_av_content,
    ANY_VALUE(bi_av_url HAVING MAX bi_av_publication_date) as url,
    ANY_VALUE(av_content_type) as av_content_type
  from
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}`
  WHERE
    $avwebFilter
    AND $avzeitraumListe
    AND bi_av_broadcasting_type LIKE 'ondemand'
    AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
  GROUP By
    --bi_av_content,
    bi_av_content_id
),
web as (
  select
    bi_av_publication_date,
    m_av_playbacks,
    bi_av_content_id,
    bi_av_content as content_titel,
    url,
    av_content_duration,
    av_content_type
  FROM
    web_raw
),
app_raw as (
  SELECT
    MAX(av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    bi_av_content_id,
    SUM(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks,
    bi_av_content,
    ANY_VALUE(bi_av_url) as url,
    ANY_VALUE(av_content_type) as av_content_type,
    MAX(bi_av_publication_date) as bi_av_publication_date
  from
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}`
  WHERE
    ${av_condition}
    AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
    AND bi_av_broadcasting_type LIKE 'ondemand'
    AND $avzeitraumListe
  GROUP BY
    bi_av_content,
    bi_av_content_id
  ORDER BY
    m_av_playbacks DESC
),
app as (
  SELECT
    m_av_playbacks,
    bi_av_content_id,
    av_content_duration,
    bi_av_content,
    url,
    av_content_type,
    bi_av_publication_date
  FROM
    app_raw
),
sum_raw as (
  SELECT
    IFNULL(
      web.bi_av_publication_date,
      app.bi_av_publication_date
    ) as bi_av_publication_date,
    IFNULL(content_titel, app.bi_av_content) as content_titel,
    IFNULL(web.av_content_duration, app.av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    IFNULL(web.bi_av_content_id, app.bi_av_content_id) as bi_av_content_id,
    IFNULL(web.url, app.url) as url,
    IFNULL(web.m_av_playbacks, 0) as playbacks_web,
    IFNULL(app.m_av_playbacks, 0) as playbacks_app,
    IFNULL(web.av_content_type, app.av_content_type) as av_content_type
  FROM
    web FULL
    JOIN app ON web.bi_av_content_id = app.bi_av_content_id
)
SELECT
  *
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      IF(
        LENGTH(MAX(bi_av_publication_date)) > 4,
        FORMAT_DATETIME(
          '%d.%m.%Y | %R Uhr',
          DATETIME(MAX(bi_av_publication_date))
        ),
        MAX(bi_av_publication_date)
      ) as Datum,
      content_titel as Titel,
      bi_av_content_id as Sophora,
      url,
      SUM(
        IFNULL(playbacks_web, 0) + IFNULL(playbacks_app, 0)
      ) as playbacks,
      SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_web, 0)) as playbacks_web,
      SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_app, 0)) as playbacks_app,
      IFNULL(av_content_duration, 0) / 1000 as av_content_duration,
      IFNULL(av_content_type, 'N/A') as av_content_type
    FROM
      sum_raw
    GROUP BY
      bi_av_content_id,
      content_titel,
      bi_av_publication_date,
      url,
      av_content_duration,
      av_content_type
  )
WHERE
  playbacks > 0
ORDER BY
  playbacks DESC
LIMIT
  100

with web_raw as (
  SELECT
    DATETIME(date) as time,
    bi_av_publication_date,
    m_av_playbacks,
    av_content_duration,
    bi_av_content_id,
    bi_av_content as content_titel,
    bi_av_url as url,
    av_content_type
  from
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}`
  WHERE
    $avwebFilter
    AND (
      bi_av_broadcasting_type LIKE 'live'
      OR bi_av_broadcasting_type LIKE 'Live'
    )
    AND $avzeitraumListe
),
web as (
  select
    MAX(bi_av_publication_date) as bi_av_publication_date,
    SUM(m_av_playbacks) as m_av_playbacks,
    bi_av_content_id,
    content_titel,
    ANY_VALUE(url) as url,
    ANY_VALUE(av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    ANY_VALUE(av_content_type) as av_content_type,
  FROM
    web_raw
  GROUP BY
    bi_av_content_id,
    content_titel 
),
app_raw as (
  SELECT
    DATETIME(date) as time,
    bi_av_publication_date,
    av_content_duration,
    bi_av_content_id,
    IFNULL(m_av_playbacks, 0) as m_av_playbacks,
    bi_av_content,
    bi_av_url as url,
    av_content_type
  from
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.av${av_table_fever_curve}`
  WHERE
    ${av_condition}
    AND (
      bi_av_broadcasting_type LIKE 'live'
      OR bi_av_broadcasting_type LIKE 'Live'
    )
    AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
    AND $avzeitraumListe 
),
app as (
  SELECT
    SUM(IFNULL(m_av_playbacks, 0)) as m_av_playbacks,
    bi_av_content_id,
    bi_av_content,
    ANY_VALUE(bi_av_publication_date) as bi_av_publication_date,
    ANY_VALUE(url) as url,
    MAX(av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    ANY_VALUE(av_content_type) as av_content_type
  FROM
    app_raw
  GROUP BY
    bi_av_content_id,
    bi_av_content
),
sum_raw as (
  SELECT
    IFNULL(
      web.bi_av_publication_date,
      app.bi_av_publication_date
    ) as bi_av_publication_date,
    IFNULL(web.content_titel, app.bi_av_content) as content_titel,
    IFNULL(web.av_content_duration, app.av_content_duration) as av_content_duration,
    IFNULL(web.bi_av_content_id, app.bi_av_content_id) as bi_av_content_id,
    IFNULL(web.url, app.url) as url,
    IFNULL(web.m_av_playbacks, 0) as playbacks_web,
    IFNULL(app.m_av_playbacks, 0) as playbacks_app,
    IFNULL(web.av_content_type, app.av_content_type) as av_content_type
  FROM
    web FULL
    JOIN app ON web.bi_av_content_id = app.bi_av_content_id
)
SELECT * FROM (SELECT
  IF(
    LENGTH(bi_av_publication_date) > 3,
    FORMAT_DATETIME(
      '%d.%m.%Y | %R Uhr',
      DATETIME(bi_av_publication_date)
    ),
    bi_av_publication_date
  ) as Datum,
  content_titel as Titel,
  bi_av_content_id as Sophora,
  url,
  SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_web, 0)) + SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_app, 0)) as playbacks,
  SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_web, 0)) as playbacks_web,
  SUM(IFNULL(playbacks_app, 0)) as playbacks_app,
  --av_content_duration/1000 as av_content_duration,
  av_content_type
FROM
  sum_raw
GROUP BY
  bi_av_content_id,
  content_titel,
  bi_av_publication_date,
  url,
  av_content_duration,
  av_content_type
)
WHERE playbacks > 0
ORDER BY
  playbacks DESC
LIMIT
  100

with raw as (
  SELECT  device_type, tmstp as time
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro` 
  WHERE ($webFilter OR CONTAINS_SUBSTR(site_level2, '$app_name'))
  AND DATE(tmstp) BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL $buffer DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE()
),
filtered as (
  SELECT device_type, COUNT(device_type) as number, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(device_type) DESC) as RNB
  FROM raw
  WHERE $Zeitraum
  GROUP BY device_type 
  ORDER BY number DESC
)
SELECT IF (RNB <= 15, device_type, 'Sonstige') as device_type, SUM(number) as number
FROM filtered
GROUP BY device_type
ORDER BY number DESC

query.rawSql:
IF ('$LRA' LIKE 'MDR') THEN (
  SELECT 'Nachrichten'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Sport'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Sorbisches Programm'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Jump'
);
ELSEIF ('$LRA' LIKE 'NDR') THEN (
  SELECT 'Alle Kapitel 1'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Nachrichten'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Kultur'
);
END IF

IF ('$LRA' LIKE 'MDR' AND '$Redaktionen' LIKE 'Nachrichten') THEN (
  SELECT 'Aktuell'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Sachsen'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Sachsen-Anhalt'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Thüringen'
);
ELSEIF ('$LRA' LIKE 'NDR' AND '$Redaktionen' LIKE 'Nachrichten') THEN (
  SELECT 'Info'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Hamburg'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Mecklenburg-Vorpommern'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Niedersachsen'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Schleswig-Holstein'
);
ELSEIF ('$LRA' LIKE 'NDR' AND '$Redaktionen' LIKE 'Alle Kapitel 1') THEN (
  SELECT 'Hamburg'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Mecklenburg-Vorpommern'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Niedersachsen'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 'Schleswig-Holstein'
);
ELSE (SELECT 'Alle Kapitel 2');
END IF

SELECT sendungs_id 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles` 
WHERE 
  LRA = '$LRA'
AND page_chapter1 = '$Redaktionen'
AND page_chapter2 = '$Unterkapitel' 
ORDER BY sendungs_id ASC

SELECT CASE '$LRA'
  WHEN 'NDR' THEN
    CASE '$Redaktionen'
      WHEN "Kultur" THEN "kultur-app"
      WHEN "Nachrichten" THEN 
        CASE '$Unterkapitel'
          WHEN 'Info'  THEN 'ndrinfo-app'
          WHEN 'Hamburg' THEN 'hh-app'
          WHEN 'Mecklenburg-Vorpommern' THEN 'mv-app'
          WHEN 'Niedersachsen' THEN 'nds-app'
          WHEN 'Schleswig-Holstein' THEN 'sh-app'
          ELSE 'KEINE APP'
        END
        WHEN "Alle Kapitel 1" THEN 
        CASE '$Unterkapitel'
          WHEN 'Info'  THEN 'ndrinfo-app'
          WHEN 'Hamburg' THEN 'hh-app'
          WHEN 'Mecklenburg-Vorpommern' THEN 'mv-app'
          WHEN 'Niedersachsen' THEN 'nds-app'
          WHEN 'Schleswig-Holstein' THEN 'sh-app'
          ELSE 'KEINE APP'
        END
      ELSE 'KEINE APP'
    END
  WHEN 'MDR' THEN 
    CASE "${Redaktionen}"
      WHEN "Sport" THEN 'app_mdrsport'
      WHEN "Jump" THEN 'app_mdrjump'
      WHEN "Nachrichten" THEN 
        CASE '$Unterkapitel'
          WHEN 'Aktuell' THEN 'app_mdraktuell'
          WHEN 'Sachsen' THEN 'app_mdrsachsen'
          WHEN 'Sachsen-Anhalt' THEN 'app_mdrsachsenanhalt'
